<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drowsy Sun Eye Drops](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1660)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 101</row>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><row>[Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These drops are made from luminescent mushrooms and refined into eye drops, which simulates a creature's natural night vision. When you attempt a Perception check to Seek, you can draw and apply a dose of drowsy sun to your eyes as part of the same action, which grants you [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) to a range of 30 feet for 1 round. If you do, your Seek action gains the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait, due to drawing and applying the eye drops.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
